workExperiences.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using React and Node.js. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Implemented various features and optimizations, resulting in a 15% increase in user engagement.

Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Worked closely with designers and backend developers to ensure seamless integration. Improved page load times by optimizing images and reducing redundant code.

Assisted in the development of web applications and websites. Conducted testing and debugging to ensure optimal performance and user experience. Created and maintained documentation for various projects.

Supported the development team in creating and testing new features. Gained hands-on experience in web development technologies and methodologies. Contributed to the improvement of internal tools and processes.
